name: Techno Plants
description:
Welcome to Techno Plants!

Use the beats to grow your sunflowers faster than the farming competition! You will find anything you need in the in-game tutorial.

This is our entry to Ludum Dare 52 Jam. Have fun!

Link to the Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/techno-plants
